pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Shoes plus socks; Waterproof gloves; Dust/mist filtering respirator (MSHA/NIOSH approval number prefix TC-21C) or a NIOSH approved respirator with N, R, P or HE filter

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if inhaled or absorbed through skin. Avoid breathing spray mist. Avoid contact with skin, eyes, or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air; If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth; Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing; Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes; Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment. You may also contact 1-800-892-0099 (24 hours) for emergency medical treatment and/or transport emergency information. For all other information, call 1-800-6-VALENT (682-5368).
